description: The schema for SONATA cloud service descriptor metatada. The metadata is stored inside the SONATA service platform along with the CSD when the CSD is stored in a service platform catalog. In contrast to the CSD, the CSD-metadata might contain values generated by the service platform.

uuid.description: The primary key of the meta-data information:

vendor_ref.description: The vendor id that identifies the vendor of the related CSD.

name_ref.description: The name id that identifies the name of the related CSD.

version_ref.description: The version id that identifies the version of the related CSD.

creation_time.description: The (Unix) timestamp this CSD metadata is created, i.e. the upload time of the CSD

creation_user.description: The user that uploaded the CSD
